articles.title: Lewis Hamilton left red-faced after botching doughnut and crashing at Las Vegas party - Express
articles.description: Lewis Hamilton, George Russell and Sergio Perez were headlining F1's official launch party for the next year's race in Las Vegas on Saturday night.
articles.content:
"I nearly crashed yeah," Hamilton said with a smile. "There was so much smoke, and I had no idea where I was. I was completely lost.

articles.title: Princess of Wales stuns in Alexander McQueen coat as she braves the rain at Rugby League World Cup - Daily Mail
articles.description: The mother-of-three, 40, said she was 'proud to be their patron' after both the men and women's teams  triumphed over Papua New Guinea and Canada DW Stadium in Wigan this afternoon.
articles.content:
The Princess of Wales cheered England to victory as she dodged the rain at the Rugby League World Cup Quarter Final after taking over the royal as patron from Prince Harry.
